desc: CharmBin carries your favorite European Health & Beauty brands including: Vichy, Kerastase, L'Oreal, Dr. Hauschka, Caudalie, Dermacol, Bioderma, Essentiale Forte, Avibon, Traumeel S, Physiogel, Actinica, Homeoplasmine, Refectocil, Eucerin. We bring you exotic French, German, and Czech products right to your door.
